1380930.name: The Kind Camomille Demo
1380930.description:
A wholesome exploration about random acts of kindness and the joy of discovery. Camomille, a kind mouse, is on her way to dear Grandmother Evelyn's 100th birthday. On a relaxing and beautiful journey she encounters people in need of a hand.

Key Features

  • Colorful, kind and relaxing adventure
  • No penalties, no death, just take your time
  • Discovery and light puzzle solving
